verifyAndRegisterG2PubkeyForOperator(add.details: This is meant to be used as a one-time way to add G2 public keys for operators that have G1 keys but no G2 key on chain

params.operator: The address of the operator to register the G2 key for
params.pubkeyG2: The G2 public key to register

verifyAndRegisterG2PubkeyForOperator(add.notice: Verifies and registers a G2 public key for an operator that already has a G1 key
